title: How much each Riot Point is worth
body:
There is an equation to how many Riot Points you get with your money. Looking at the 520 RP deal, which gives no bonus points, we can write the equation, (520 ÷ 500c) = 1.04

Therefore, 1 cent can get you 1.04 Riot Points.

This also means that mobile payment in the store is a complete rip-off and is for the desperate people who need RP.

Math does help, apparently

replies.body:
The issue is that your argument is based on the worst RP conversion (for normal payments).

Also the mobile payments are for people on pre-paid phones, as you get to spend your recharge on buying RP.

Lowest of normal payments: 1.04:1
Highest (100): 1.21:1
Middle Ground (35): 1.14:1

Mobile Payments (12): 0.56:1

So while Mobile payments are roughly half as much in worth, they can also be essentially free (prepaid phones these days come with enough deals that you don't need your recharge credit)
